actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require institutions of higher education to post certain IRS returns on their websites.
short_title: Increased Transparency in Higher Education Act of 2012

summary.text: Increased Transparency in Higher Education Act of 2012 - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require each nonprofit institution of higher education that receives federal financial assistance to post its tax return on its website.

titles.title: Increased Transparency in Higher Education Act of 2012
A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require institutions of higher education to post certain IRS returns on their websites.
